#!/bin/bash
# Dream-Mind-Lucid One-Click Mainnet Deployment Script
# Deploys to both Solana (Helius) and SKALE (Public RPC) with zero-gas operations

set -e  # Exit on any error

# Colors for output
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
PURPLE='\033[0;35m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Banner
echo -e "${PURPLE}"
cat << "EOF"
 ██████╗ ██████╗ ███████╗ █████╗ ███╗   ███╗    ███╗   ███╗██╗███╗   ██╗██████╗     ██╗     ██╗   ██╗ ██████╗██╗██████╗
